Posts.Content: I have been on Metformin and vitamin D for Prostate cancer,continuing after radiation therapy IGRT/IMRT "cured", I hope they will prevent another recurrence and other cancers, especially Pancreatic. Vitamin D, Aspirin with Metformin prevent cancers and improve survival in Cancer Patients http://cancerpreventionresearch.aacr...ontent/7/4/388 https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/25903858
Posts.Title: Vitamin D, Aspirin with Metformin prevent cancers and improve survival in Cancer
